scripts.change_icon: "C:/Program Files (x86)/Resource Hacker/ResourceHacker.exe" -open "./dist/src/win64/src.exe" -save "./dist/src/win64/Web-dl.exe" -action addoverwrite -res "../assets/icon.ico" -mask ICONGROUP,IDR_MAINFRAME && cd ../assets/ && copy icon.ico "../app/dist/src/win64/" && cd ../app/dist/src/win64 && del /f src.exe && cd ../../../
scripts.prod: nwbuild --platforms win64 --buildDir dist/ src/ && yarn change_icon && echo Done!
